stories.text: Basically title. I got rid of my copy of Rosen's book after undgergrad but am not keen on enduring it again. However, I'm also in need to reflect and refresh on the topics discussed therein. Thank you.
stories.title: Ask HN: What Discrete Maths books are there for CS grads in need of a refresher?

stories.text:
Hello, is there any good software i can run on ubuntu or centos to scan a website for malware that anyone knows about? - one that is kept up-to date with latest malware. - has an api/binary so i can sent it commands and get results ( via nodejs ) - flexible with settings

something like clamAV would be perfect if it could scan a website
stories.title: Ask HN: Free software to scan website for malware with API?
